detailed_goals: Expand on the core mechanics by adding a basic resource system (e.g., health, mana, or stamina) and integrate it with the combat and movement systems.
Implement a simple UI to display these resources.
Add some basic sound effects for the core mechanics.
Implement a resource management system (health, mana, stamina).
Design and integrate UI elements to display resource values.
Add basic audio manager and integrate sound effects.
Integrate the resource system with combat and movement (e.g., stamina drain for running).
Implement UI elements to display health, mana, and stamina.
Add sound effects for attacks, impacts, and player actions.
UI design for the resource system (health, mana, stamina).
Visual effects for resource depletion and replenishment.
Concept art for any special abilities or power-ups.
Visual polish of existing character models and animations.
Implementation of visual feedback for resource usage (e.g., character glows when using mana).
Add more detail and variety to the environment.
Implement visual cues to guide the player and communicate game information.
